question: When you get a hot new listing lead, do you:

answers.text: Call them immediately and start a conversation
Do research first and plan your strategy

question: Your client wants to see 5 houses in one day. You prefer to:

answers.text: Stick to an organized schedule, all details in advance
Stay flexible — adjust plans as you go
Emphasize the design potential and vision
Focus on facts and practical repairs needed

question: How do you build trust with clients?

answers.text: By showing empathy and understanding their story
By giving clear data and professional analysis

question: At an open house, you feel energized by:

answers.text: Meeting and chatting with lots of people

question: When making your marketing plan for a listing, you:

answers.text: Stick to proven strategies that always work
Try new ideas to stand out in the market

question: You’re negotiating a deal. Do you:

answers.text: Push hard for your client’s best interests, no matter what
Look for a win-win that makes everyone feel good

question: When your week is fully booked, you prefer:

answers.text: Having a tight schedule with set appointments
